languages.text: {n}Караэль переводит взгляд на Маражая.{/n} "Архонт Иремерисс. Архонт Назракей. Культ Губительной жажды. Достаточно, чтобы сомневающиеся в праве Эзирраеш или желающие попробовать перейти этому роду дорогу прикусили языки от страха стать следующими жертвами. Достаточно, чтобы принудить Комморру принять архонта Маражая".

{n}Kharael shifts his gaze to Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. The Cult of the Fatal Thirst. These are compelling reasons to make any who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder this line bite their tongues, lest they become its next victims. Compelling enough to force Commorragh into accepting Archon Marazhai."
languages.original_text: {n}Караэль переводит взгляд на Маражая.{/n} "Архонт Иремерисс. Архонт Назракей. Культ Губительной жажды. Достаточно, чтобы сомневающиеся в праве Эзирраеш или желающие попробовать перейти этому роду дорогу прикусили языки от страха стать следующими жертвами. Достаточно, чтобы принудить Комморру принять архонта Маражая".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael shifts his gaze to Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. The Succubi of the Fatal Thirst. More than enough for those who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder them to bite their tongues lest they become the next victims. Enough to force Commorragh into accepting Archon Marazhai."
traits.speaker: Karael

These are compelling reasons to make any who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder this line bite their tongues, lest they become its next victims. languages.text: {n}Kharael blickt zu Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. Der Kult des Fatalen Dursts. Das sind für jeden, der an den Aezyrraesh zweifelt oder diese Linie behindern will, überzeugende Gründe sich auf die Zunge zu beißen. Auf dass er nicht zu ihrem nächsten Opfer wird. Überzeugend genug, um Commorragh zu zwingen, Archon Marazhai zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael shifts his gaze to Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. The Cult of the Fatal Thirst. These are compelling reasons to make any who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder this line bite their tongues, lest they become its next victims. Compelling enough to force Commorragh into accepting Archon Marazhai."

Das sind für jeden, der an den Aezyrraesh zweifelt oder diese Linie behindern will, überzeugende Gründe sich auf die Zunge zu beißen. Auf dass er nicht zu ihrem nächsten Opfer wird. Überzeugend genug, um Commorragh zu zwingen, Archon Marazhai zu akzeptieren."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔将目光转向玛拉斋。{/n}“伊芮梅莉斯执政官，纳札骸执政官，还有致命饥渴教派——这些理由相当足以让人信服。就算有谁胆敢怀疑艾泽拉什家族，或是打算阻碍执政官回到科摩罗，他们也都会三思而后行，以免自己沦为下一个猎物。玛拉斋执政官有足够令人信服的理由，足以迫使科摩罗再次接纳他。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael shifts his gaze to Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. The Cult of the Fatal Thirst. These are compelling reasons to make any who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder this line bite their tongues, lest they become its next victims. Compelling enough to force Commorragh into accepting Archon Marazhai."

traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael se tourne vers Marazhai.{/n} « L'archonte Yremeryss. L'archonte Nazrakhei. Le Culte de la Soif Fatale. Des raisons suffisantes de museler quiconque doute des Aezyrraesh ou souhaite entraver leur marche, car ils risqueraient d'en devenir les prochaines victimes. Suffisantes pour forcer Commorragh à accepter l'archonte Marazhai. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael shifts his gaze to Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. The Cult of the Fatal Thirst. These are compelling reasons to make any who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder this line bite their tongues, lest they become its next victims. Compelling enough to force Commorragh into accepting Archon Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael se tourne vers Marazhai.{/n} « L'archonte Yremeryss. L'archonte Nazrakhei. Le Culte de la Soif Fatale. Des raisons suffisantes de museler quiconque doute des Aezyrraesh ou souhaite entraver leur marche, car ils risqueraient d'en devenir les prochaines victimes. Suffisantes pour forcer Commorragh à accepter l'archonte Marazhai. »
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael se gira hacia Marazhai.{/n} «La Arconte Yremeryss. El Arconte Nazrakhei. El Culto de la Sed Letal. Son motivos muy convincentes para que quienes dudan de los Aezyrraesh o quieren sabotear a su linaje se muerdan la lengua para evitar ser sus siguientes víctimas. Son lo bastante convincentes como para obligar a Commorragh a aceptar al Arconte Marazhai».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael shifts his gaze to Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. The Cult of the Fatal Thirst. These are compelling reasons to make any who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder this line bite their tongues, lest they become its next victims. Compelling enough to force Commorragh into accepting Archon Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael se gira hacia Marazhai.{/n} «La Arconte Yremeryss. El Arconte Nazrakhei. El Culto de la Sed Letal. Son motivos muy convincentes para que quienes dudan de los Aezyrraesh o quieren sabotear a su linaje se muerdan la lengua para evitar ser sus siguientes víctimas. Son lo bastante convincentes como para obligar a Commorragh a aceptar al Arconte Marazhai».
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}カラエルが視線をマラズハイに移す。{/n}「アーコン・イレメリス。アーコン・ナズラクヘイ。宿命の渇き教団。これらが重要な理由なのです。アエジレシュに疑いを持つ者や、血族の邪魔をしようとする者の本音を封じている理由です。そうでなければ、彼ら自身が次の犠牲者となる。コモラフにアーコン・マラズハイをなんとしても受け入れさせるためには重要なことなのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael shifts his gaze to Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. The Cult of the Fatal Thirst. These are compelling reasons to make any who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder this line bite their tongues, lest they become its next victims. Compelling enough to force Commorragh into accepting Archon Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}カラエルが視線をマラズハイに移す。{/n}「アーコン・イレメリス。アーコン・ナズラクヘイ。宿命の渇き教団。これらが重要な理由なのです。アエジレシュに疑いを持つ者や、血族の邪魔をしようとする者の本音を封じている理由です。そうでなければ、彼ら自身が次の犠牲者となる。コモラフにアーコン・マラズハイをなんとしても受け入れさせるためには重要なことなのです」
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Kharael, bakışlarını Marazhai'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Arkon Yremeryss. Arkon Nazrakhei. Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı. Bunlar hep Aezyrraesh'ten şüphe edenlerin veya yoluna çıkmak isteyenlerin dillerini ısırmalarına sebep olacak, geçerli sebepler. Kimse bir sonraki kurban olmak istemez. Commorragh'ı Arkon Marazhai'ı kabul etmeye zorlayacak kadar geçerliler."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael shifts his gaze to Marazhai.{/n} "Archon Yremeryss. Archon Nazrakhei. The Cult of the Fatal Thirst. These are compelling reasons to make any who doubt the Aezyrraesh or wish to hinder this line bite their tongues, lest they become its next victims. Compelling enough to force Commorragh into accepting Archon Marazhai."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael bakışlarını Marazhai'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Arkon Yremeryss. Arkon Nazrakhei. Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı. Bunlar hep Aezyrraesh'ten şüphe edenlerin veya yoluna çıkmak isteyenlerin dillerini ısırmalarına sebep olacak, geçerli sebepler. Kimse bir sonraki kurban olmak istemez. Commorragh'ı Arkon Marazhai'ı kabul etmeye zorlayacak kadar geçerli sebepler bunlar."
traits.speaker: Karael
